Reviews.Title: Charger
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: It works great and thanks it is not available anywhere else at this great price. It works on almost all of the cell phone watches I have came across.

Reviews.Title: As fragil as the original , it took 4 months to be available!
Reviews.Author: Victor M Chavez
Reviews.Content: It didn't last more than one month since I got it, when the cable was broken, I couldn't charge my watch anymore. Then I started looking for it daily, finally I found it in Amazon.  It works fine, but it looks as fragil as the first one. I am planningBuying another one as well  as a replacement battery. It's incredible that such a phone can't be usefull due to those things. There must be a place where we can find parts for SVP G13

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Compgeek
Reviews.Content: The product is garbage.  It fell apart within a few hours and it was never able to charge my Cell Phone Watch.  The original adapter broke within a few days also.  Very poor quality.  I loved the concept of the watch but it wasn't worth the cost.  Very Disappointed!!!
